sentences_tone.text: Kevin Hart and Eniko Parrish welcome babyThe comedian tweeted Tuesday that his wife, Eniko Parrish, had given birth to their son."God is truly amazing....Kenzo Kash Hart was born at 1:45am ," Hart tweeted.
Thank you all for your prayers!!!!
We love & appreciate ya."It's the first child for the couple.

Hart has two children -- a daughter, Heaven, 12, and a son, Hendrix, 10, with ex-wife Torrei Hart.Hart's children were attendants when the couple married in a lavish ceremony last year after dating for several years.
